title: Journey Planner
desc: Route Planning: Input locations to plan and calculate travel routes
Business Integration: Search and add nearby restaurants, bars, and hotels
History Tracking: View past travel routes through personal account history

title: Cryptopoly
desc: Hoya2022 Hackathon "Build a Game Track Prize"
A web two players Monopoly board game with cryptocurrencies theme

title: BioSimulation
desc: A simple web simulation for the Nernst and Goldman equation

title: Science Sims 3D
desc: Turn 2D simulations in Science.js into 3D simulation using Three.js
Ball, Vector, Pendulum, Solar System 3D simulation

title: Visual Plot
desc: Reproducing charts such as Timeline, Calendar, Arc, Bubble and Map using d3.js

title: OpenSpace Remote Control
desc: Remote control based on OpenSpace Socket api
Interactive web app to handle remote control
Speech control by Web Speech API
